function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     var value  = api.data.verticalA_headlinemetric1.output.result[0].value;
    if(value>=13 && value<20){
        api.setState('tab3verticalAMetric1ShowAmber',false); //Show component

        api.setState('tab3verticalAMetric1ShowAmber',true);
    }
